oﬀset, called the diﬀerence order, e.g. 12 for one year of months prior.
# difference dataset
def difference(data, interval):
return [data[i] - data[i - interval] for i in range(interval, len(data))]
Listing 14.37: Example of a function for diﬀerencing a series.
